title: Structure a Virtual PPA (VPPA)
description: A corporate buyer wants to sign a Virtual Power Purchase Agreement (VPPA) to support a new wind farm and receive its RECs, without taking physical delivery of the power.

tasks.description: Explain the structure of a VPPA, which is a financial contract for difference.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates how a VPPA works.

tasks.description: Negotiate the key terms: contract tenor, volume, and the fixed 'strike price' for the energy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent helps establish the core financial terms of the agreement.

tasks.description: Draft the contract, specifying the settlement mechanism (the difference between the floating market price and the fixed strike price) and the transfer of the associated RECs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts a term sheet for the VPPA.
